name: HighPointUniversityDailyMotivation
0:
”Alexa, Open High Point University.”
”Alexa, ask High Point University for Daily Motivation.”
”Alexa, ask High Point University for a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: high point university
des: The High Point University Daily Motivation “Skill” allows Alexa to play daily motivational quotes from High Point University President Nido R. Qubein and HPU students. The skill also shares interesting facts about HPU. The skill was developed by a team of High Point University students and led by Parker Ramsey, ‘17.
